Name: Employee：mika
About the game: Story The story tells that the male lead Kihara needs to work hard to study and pass the postgraduate entrance examination, but due to heavy schoolwork, all living expenses are borne by Kihara’s girlfriend Mika. The hostess Mei Xiang started her part-time job, looking for a suitable job in Beiqiu Town. But she never expected that it would be so difficult to find a suitable job in the small town. Under the pressure of life, Mei Xiang can only find another way. PS: The game contains a large number of (100%) NTR plots, and the pure love fighters should be careful. Kihara A diligent and eager to learn super schoolmaster, pure and kind, is studying hard, preparing to be admitted to graduate school. Mixiang Kihara's girlfriend, alone shoulders the burden of all family income, and works outside every day to earn Kihara's tuition. How to play Interactive novel, the player controls the heroine to travel around the Middle East in Beiqiu Town, find a suitable job and earn money to support the family, and collect the tuition to complete the game. Warning again: The game contains a lot of (100%) NTR plot, pure love fighters should be cautious. If you have any thoughts or suggestions on the game, please comment or contact me.
